channel.title: Making interfaces NEED HELP IM STUCK
channel.description:
How do i make my own interfaces cause Im using the source project sony and when you log in it says welcome to project sony and has all the info down the bottom and i searched for the info down in client.java the bottom and i found it but could not find the "Welcome to project sony"
Does any1 know?

item.title: Making interfaces NEED HELP IM STUCK
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

Class9 and look for Project Sony.

i went into class 9 into my client and i searched for it and its not there

I SEARCHED FOR INTERFACE ID IN CLASS 9 AND I FOUND SO HES THE CODE - THE CODE IS 23240

public static void newwelcome(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intnewwelcome = addDTab(23240); intnewwelcome.anIntArray240 = new int[10]; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241 = new int[10]; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272 = new int[10]; intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[0] = 23241; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addSprite(23241, 0, 0, "mainframe copy"); //Control 23242 (0) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[1] = 23242; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[1] = 230; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[1] = 294; //Label addText(23242, "Label", wid, 1, 0xFF9040); //Control 23243 (1) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[2] = 23243; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[2] = 8; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[2] = 25; //Image addSprite(23243, 0, 0, "duderight 0 0"); //Control 23244 (2) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[3] = 23244; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[3] = 172; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[3] = 263; //Close button addCloseButton(23244, "play 0 0", 170, 26, "Close"); //Control 23245 (3) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[4] = 23245; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[4] = 228; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[4] = 97; //Label addText(23245, "Message of the Week", wid, 3, 0x804040); //Control 23246 (4) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[5] = 23246; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[5] = 135; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[5] = 120; //Label addText(23246, "Label 2", wid, 3, 0x804040); //Control 23247 (5) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[6] = 23247; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[6] = 229; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[6] = 166; //Label addText(23247, "Label 3", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 23248 (6) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[7] = 23248; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[7] = 410; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[7] = 26; //Image addSprite(23248, 0, 0, "dude 0 0"); //Control 23249 (7) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[8] = 23249; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[8] = 112; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[8] = 224; //Label addText(23249, "Label 4", wid, 0, 0xFF9040); //Control 23250 (8) intnewwelcome.anIntArray240[9] = 23250; intnewwelcome.anIntArray241[9] = 328; intnewwelcome.anIntArray272[9] = 224; //Label addText(23250, "Label 5", wid, 0, 0xFF9040); //Added 9 controls. }

item.title: Making interfaces NEED HELP IM STUCK
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Interfaces must be added Client-Side. You cannot add Interfaces on a Server, only on a Client.
You would use the Server to add effects for the Interface, such as clicking on it, and stuff happens because of it, etc.

Read full topic
